Hand-drawn Map Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at Grymforge, (X:-538 Y:465). You can loot the Hand-drawn Map from a nearby backpack, to update the Quest Free True Soul Nere (Find the explosives). Quest: Free True Soul Nere Crafting: N/A Merchant: N/A
